meanings.definition: A type of virus that causes the common cold.
meanings.sent1: The rhinovirus spread quickly through the school, causing many students to catch colds.
meanings.sent2: I caught a rhinovirus from my coworker and had to stay home with a runny nose.
meanings.sent3: The rhinovirus decided to take a vacation in my nose, making me sneeze all day.
meanings.sent4: The rhinovirus was a tiny invader, bringing a wave of sniffles and coughs to the town.
meanings.sent5: Battling the rhinovirus felt like fighting a tiny, invisible enemy that made me feel miserable.
